typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 9999999) ~> source1
Aggregate1 filter(OrderPriority=='H') ~> Filter1
source1 aggregate(groupBy(Region = Region,
		Country = Country,
		OrderPriority = OrderPriority),
	TotalRevenue = sum(TotalRevenue),
		TotalProfit = avg(TotalProfit)) ~> Aggregate1
Filter1 sink(input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
